title: 3 Pandas 2: Night
description: How could three cute little pandas get into so much trouble? Help three pandas survive the night! Guide them through each level by interacting with their environment and taking advantage of their special abilities. Use teamwork to overcome obstacles, and make sure that you don't leave any panda behind!
controls: Control the pandas with your mouse and use their unique abilities to guide them along their adventure. Click on a panda to display his ability, and then click on the ability to perform the action.
